SDG_TARGET:
3.4

By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being
STAT_CONC_DEF: The Suicide mortality rate is defined as the number of suicide deaths in a year per 100, 000 population. Crude Suicide Rate (not age-adjusted)
OTHER_DOC:
Other information

New project on collecting death information through Verbal autopsy on 20 districts is ongoing and is expected to be scaled up to 30 more districts by 2018
